title: Practice: Finance Tracker File Manager with Pathlib
description:
Build a file manager for your Personal Finance Tracker that:

1. Creates an organized directory structure for financial data
2. Finds all transaction files (JSON, CSV)
3. Reports file sizes and modification dates
4. Backs up files to an archive folder
5. Generates a directory summary report

**Use pathlib features:**
- Path() / operator for joining paths
- .mkdir(parents=True, exist_ok=True) for directory creation
- .glob() and .rglob() for finding files
- .stat() for file metadata
- .suffix and .stem for file name operations

hints.text: Use path.glob('**/*') for recursive file search. Use path.suffix for extension. Use path.stat().st_size for file size. Use path.mkdir(parents=True, exist_ok=True) to create directories safely.
